languages.text: {n}Киберпес подчиняется только командам арбитра. Сейчас он здесь — а значит, Соломон приказал ему прыгнуть в люк вслед за вами. Скорее всего, законник успел переключить приоритеты Глейто на вашу охрану.{/n}

{n}A cyber-mastiff listens only to its Arbites master. The fact that Glaito is here means that Solomorne has ordered him to follow you through the trapdoor. The Arbitrator must have adjusted Glaito's priorities to have him guard you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Киберпес подчиняется только командам арбитра. Сейчас он здесь — а значит, Соломон приказал ему прыгнуть в люк вслед за вами. Скорее всего, законник успел переключить приоритеты Глейто на вашу охрану.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A cyber-mastiff listens only to its Arbites master. The fact that Glaito is here means that Solomorne has ordered him to follow you through the trapdoor. The Arbitrator must have adjusted Glaito's priorities to have him guard you.{/n}

{n}A cyber-mastiff listens only to its Arbites master. The fact that Glaito is here means that Solomorne has ordered him to follow you through the trapdoor. The Arbitrator must have adjusted Glaito's priorities to have him guard you.{/n}

{n}A cyber-mastiff listens only to its Arbites master. The fact that Glaito is here means that Solomorne has ordered him to follow you through the trapdoor. The Arbitrator must have adjusted Glaito's priorities to have him guard you.{/n}

{n}A cyber-mastiff listens only to its Arbites master. The fact that Glaito is here means that Solomorne has ordered him to follow you through the trapdoor. The Arbitrator must have adjusted Glaito's priorities to have him guard you.{/n}

{n}A cyber-mastiff listens only to its Arbites master. The fact that Glaito is here means that Solomorne has ordered him to follow you through the trapdoor. The Arbitrator must have adjusted Glaito's priorities to have him guard you.{/n}

{n}A cyber-mastiff listens only to its Arbites master. The fact that Glaito is here means that Solomorne has ordered him to follow you through the trapdoor. The Arbitrator must have adjusted Glaito's priorities to have him guard you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}生化獒犬只会听从法务官主人的命令。格雷托出现在这里，这意味着索罗蒙命令它跟随你穿过活板门。索罗蒙肯定是调整了格雷托的任务优先级，命令它优先保护你的安全。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cyber-mastiff listens only to its Arbites master. The fact that Glaito is here means that Solomorne has ordered him to follow you through the trapdoor. The Arbitrator must have adjusted Glaito's priorities to have him guard you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}生化獒犬只会听从法务官主人的命令。格雷托出现在这里，这意味着索罗蒙命令它跟随你穿过活板门。索罗蒙肯定是调整了格雷托的任务优先级，命令它优先保护你的安全。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los cibermastines solo obedecen a sus amos del Arbites. El hecho de que Glaito esté aquí significa que Solomorne le ha ordenado que te siga a través de la trampilla. El Arbitrator debe de haber configurado las prioridades de Glaito para que te proteja.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cyber-mastiff listens only to its Arbites master. The fact that Glaito is here means that Solomorne has ordered him to follow you through the trapdoor. The Arbitrator must have adjusted Glaito's priorities to have him guard you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los cibermastines solo obedecen a sus amos del Arbites. El hecho de que Glaito esté aquí significa que Solomorne le ha ordenado que te siga a través de la trampilla. El Arbitrator debe de haber configurado las prioridades de Glaito para que te proteja.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir siber mastif yalnızca Yargıcı efendisini dinler. Glaito'nun burada olması, Solomorne'un ona seni takip etmesini emrettiği anlamına geliyor. Yargıcı, Glaito'nun en büyük önceliğini seni korumak olacak şekilde değiştirmiş olmalı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cyber-mastiff listens only to its Arbites master. The fact that Glaito is here means that Solomorne has ordered him to follow you through the trapdoor. The Arbitrator must have adjusted Glaito's priorities to have him guard you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir siber mastif yalnızca Yargıcı efendisini dinler. Glaito'nun burada olması, Solomorne'un ona seni takip etmesini emrettiği anlamına geliyor. Yargıcı, Glaito'nun en büyük önceliğini seni korumak olacak şekilde değiştirmiş olmalı.{/n}

languages.text: {n}サイバーマスチフは、その高等裁定局の主人の命令のみを聞く。グライトがここにいるということは、ソロモーンがグライトに落とし戸を通ってあなたに付いていくように命令したということだ。アービトレイターは、グライトの優先事項をあなたの護衛に変更したに違いない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cyber-mastiff listens only to its Arbites master. The fact that Glaito is here means that Solomorne has ordered him to follow you through the trapdoor. The Arbitrator must have adjusted Glaito's priorities to have him guard you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}サイバーマスチフは、その高等裁定局の主人の命令のみを聞く。グライトがここにいるということは、ソロモーンがグライトに落とし戸を通ってあなたに付いていくように命令したということだ。アービトレイターは、グライトの優先事項をあなたの護衛に変更したに違いない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un cyber-mastiff n'écoute que son maître de l'Arbites. Si Glaito est ici, c'est que Solomorne lui a ordonné de vous suivre à travers la trappe. L'arbitrator a dû modifier les priorités de son chien pour qu'il vous protège coûte que coûte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cyber-mastiff listens only to its Arbites master. The fact that Glaito is here means that Solomorne has ordered him to follow you through the trapdoor. The Arbitrator must have adjusted Glaito's priorities to have him guard you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un cyber-mastiff n'écoute que son maître de l'Arbites. Si Glaito est ici, c'est que Solomorne lui a ordonné de vous suivre à travers la trappe. L'arbitrator a dû modifier les priorités de son chien pour qu'il vous protège coûte que coûte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein Cyber-Mastiff hört nur auf seinen Arbites-Meister. Wenn Glaito hier ist, muss ihm Solomorne befohlen haben, dir durch die Falltür zu folgen. Der Arbitrator muss Glaitos Prioritäten angepasst haben, damit er dich beschützt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cyber-mastiff listens only to its Arbites master. The fact that Glaito is here means that Solomorne has ordered him to follow you through the trapdoor. The Arbitrator must have adjusted Glaito's priorities to have him guard you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Cyber-Mastiff hört nur auf seinen Arbites-Meister. Wenn Glaito hier ist, muss ihm Solomorne befohlen haben, dir durch die Falltür zu folgen. Der Arbitrator muss Glaitos Prioritäten angepasst haben, damit er dich beschützt.{/n}
